channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.4.4
item.description:
• PostgreSQL 9.5.25 with PostGIS 2.2.8
  • PostgreSQL 9.6.23 with PostGIS 2.3.11
  • PostgreSQL 10.18 with PostGIS 2.4.9
  • PostgreSQL 11.13 with PostGIS 2.5.5
  • PostgreSQL 12.8 with PostGIS 3.0.3
  • PostgreSQL 13.4 with PostGIS 3.1.3

item.title: Postgres.app 2.1.9
item.description:
This is the August 2019 quarterly update for PostgreSQL.

  • PostgreSQL 10.10 with PostGIS 2.4.7
  • PostgreSQL 9.6.15 with PostGIS 2.3.9
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.19 with PostGIS 2.2.8

PostgreSQL 11.5 and 12beta3 are available separately and can be download from postgresapp.com/downloads.html
